name: jQuery
description: jQuery is a fast, small, and feature-rich JavaScript library. It makes things like HTML document traversal and manipulation, event handling, animation, and Ajax much simpler with an easy-to-use API that works across a multitude of browsers.
need: We use jquery as a JavaScript framework for HTML document traversal and manipulation, event handling and AJAX API calls.
comment: There are newer versions of jQuery libary but we use this version because newer versions doesn't support Internet Explorer 6 and 7.

file.name: jquery-1.10.2.min
file.description: Core JavaScript library of jQuery framework

file.name: jquery-1.10.2.min
file.description: Holds information about original jQuery source file and maps a combined/minified jQuery core file to an unbuilt state.
